Amazing - seriously amazingIf I ever go to Barcelona again, I will be visiting this place for sure. The lasagna was great, the ravioli is like eating a pillow full of ambrosia, and the tiramisu was light, flavorful and just the right size. The price of the food is perfect. But get there early because it will get crowded. And definitely because of the good food. If they ever come to America, I will travel as far as needed to visit them.
